Custom Theme Development

Bootstrap Based Theme for Applications

Design Guidelines

  • You may only place text in components with a background.
  • Use text color sparingly, keep track of it, and ensure it is always readable.

Rotational Gradients

  • Â· 64 Additional Classes
  • Â· Naming scheme: bg-primary gr-degree of angle
  • Â· Angles 45Â°, 90Â°, 135Â°, 180Â°, 225Â°, 270Â°, 315Â°.
  • Â· Colors primary, secondary, success, info, warning, danger, light, dark.
  • Â· Example: "bg-primary gr-45" applies a primary colored gradient at 45Â° of angle.
  • Â· Note: 0Â° angle is expressed without indicating any degree of angle (ex: Gradient of primary color at 0Â° is written as "bg-primary gr").
  • Â· Note: you can lower class count (file size) by removing angles from configuration.
  • Â· Note: you fallback on standard colors by disabling the Rotational Gradient stylesheet.
